Translations.Text: Vam nalezhytʹ polovyna toho, shcho lyshyly druzhyny vashi — yakshcho u nykh nemaye dytyny. A yakshcho u nykh ye dytyna, to vam nalezhytʹ chvertʹ toho, shcho vony lyshyly — pislya podilu toho, shcho bulo vkazano u zapoviti, abo pislya vyplaty borhu. Druzhynam zhe nalezhytʹ chvertʹ toho, shcho zalyshyly vy, yakshcho u vas nemaye dytyny. Yakshcho u vas ye dytyna, to yim nalezhytʹ vosʹma chastyna toho, shcho zalyshyly vy — pislya podilu toho, shcho bulo vkazano u zapoviti, abo pislya vyplaty borhu. Yakshcho zh cholovik abo zhinka ne mayutʹ pryamykh spadkoyemtsiv, ale mayutʹ brata chy sestru, to kozhnomu z nykh nalezhytʹ odna shosta. Yakshcho zh brativ i sester bude bilʹshe, nizh dvoye, to vony mayutʹ spilʹni prava na svoyu tretynu — pislya podilu toho, shcho bulo vkazano u zapoviti, abo pislya vyplaty borhu – yakshcho ne zavdastʹ tse shkody. Same tse zapovidaye Allah, Allah — Vseznayuchyy, Zhalislyvyy
Takymy ye obmezhennya Allaha. Tykh, khto korytʹsya Allahu ta Yoho Poslantsyu, Vin vvede do sadiv, de techutʹ riky. Vony budutʹ tam doviku. Tse i ye velykyy uspikh
A toho, khto chynytyme neposlukh Allahu ta Yoho Poslantsyu i bude porushuvaty Yoho obmezhennya, Vin vvede do vohnyu, i toy bude tam doviku. Chekaye na nʹoho hanebna kara
